#summary Installation Guide for Lighttpd with mod-H.264 on Ubuntu 8 (Hardy)

==Resolve the dependancies==

There are a set of dependancies that need to be resolved before the lighttpd 1.5.0 package can be built:

{{{
####### installing gettext-0.16.1.tar.gz needed for glib-2.9.6.tar.bz2
wget ftp://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gettext/gettext-0.16.1.tar.gz
tar xzf gettext-0.16.1.tar.gz
cd gettext-0.16.1
./configure
make
make install
cd ..

####### installing bzip2 needed for glib-2.9.6.tar.bz2
wget http://www.bzip.org/1.0.4/bzip2-1.0.4.tar.gz
tar xzf bzip2-1.0.4.tar.gz
cd bzip2-1.0.4
vi Makefile
change CFLAGS to include "-fPIC" (this step is very important)
make
make install
cd ..

####### installing glib-2.9.6.tar.bz2
wget ftp://ftp.gtk.org/pub/gtk/v2.9/glib-2.9.6.tar.bz2
tar xjf glib-2.9.6.tar.bz2
cd glib-2.9.6
./configure
make
make install
cd ..

####### installing pkg-config-0.21.tar.gz
wget http://pkgconfig.freedesktop.org/releases/pkg-config-0.21.tar.gz
tar xzf pkg-config-0.21.tar.gz
cd pkg-config-0.21
./configure
make
make install
mv /usr/bin/pkg-config /usr/bin/pkg-config.bak
cp /usr/local/bin/pkg-config /usr/bin/pkg-config
cd ..

####### NOW WE CAN INSTALL lighttpd-1.5.0-r1691.tar.gz
wget 
http://www.lighttpd.net/assets/2007/2/23/lighttpd-1.5.0-r1691.tar.gz
tar xzf lighttpd-1.5.0-r1691.tar.gz
cd lighttpd-1.5.0
./configure --with-linux-aio
make
make install
cd ../..
}}}

==Build the Lighttpd 1.5.0 Release===

{{{
svn export http://h264.code-shop.com/svn/h264/tags/mod_h264_streaming-2.0/lighttpd-1.5.0 lighttpd-1.5.0
svn export --force http://h264.code-shop.com/svn/h264/tags/mod_h264_streaming-2.0/mp4split lighttpd-1.5.0/src
cd ~/lighttpd-1.4.18
./configure
make
sudo make install
}}}
